codeSystems.name: UdsPlusBirthSexCodes
codeSystems.title: Uds Plus Birth Sex Codes
codeSystems.description: The Uds Plus Birth Sex Codes is a set of codes for identifying the birth sex of Patients.

codeSystems.name: UdsPlusGenderIdentityCodes
codeSystems.title: Uds Plus Gender Identity Codes
codeSystems.description: The Uds Plus Gender Identity Codes is a 'starter set' of codes for identifying the gender identity of Patients.

codeSystems.name: UdsPlusInsuranceCodes
codeSystems.title: Uds Plus Insurance Codes
codeSystems.description: The Uds Plus Insurance Codes is a 'starter set' of codes for identifying the source of the insurance for Patients.

codeSystems.name: UdsPlusServiceDeliveryCodes
codeSystems.title: Uds Plus Service Delivery Codes
codeSystems.description: The UDS Plus CodeSystem is an 'addition set' of one code to the existing Location Service Delivery Codes value set for UDS+ purposes.

codeSystems.name: UdsPlusSexualOrientationCodes
codeSystems.title: Uds Plus Sexual Orientation Codes
codeSystems.description: The Uds Plus Sexual Orientation Codes is a 'starter set' of codes for identifying the sexual orientation of Patients.

codeSystems.name: UdsPlusAgricultureWorkerStatusCodes
codeSystems.title: Uds Plus Agriculture Worker Status Codes
codeSystems.description: The Uds Plus Agriculture Worker Status Codes is a 'starter set' of codes for specifying agriculture worker status for Patients.

codeSystems.name: UdsPlusHousingStatusCodes
codeSystems.title: Uds Plus Housing Status Codes
codeSystems.description: The Uds Plus Housing Status Codes is a 'starter set' of codes for identifying the Patient's housing status.
